content:
# elizaos-plugins/plugin-twitter Daily Update (Jan 25, 2026)
## OVERVIEW 
Today's development focused on a new feature for broker authentication and addressing a critical user issue regarding project generation.

## KEY TECHNICAL DEVELOPMENTS

## NEWLY OPENED PULL REQUESTS
A new pull request, [#47](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-twitter/pull/47), was opened to introduce a broker authentication mode with offline tests.

## CLOSED ISSUES

## NEW ISSUES

## ACTIVE ISSUES
### Project Generation Failure and CLI Wrapper Issue
Issue [#6388](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-twitter/issues/6388), "Can not generate project," was actively discussed and resolved today. The user initially reported errors when running `elizaos create` despite following documentation. After being asked for their ElizaOS version, the user confirmed they were using the latest (1.7.2) but still encountered issues, including when trying to get the CLI version. It was identified that the CLI wrapper was broken. A temporary workaround was provided: `bun -i g @elizaos/cli`. The issue was resolved for the user, and related fixes were implemented in the ElizaOS core ([#6389](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6389)) and documentation ([#83](https://github.com/elizaOS/docs/pull/83)).
